resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108713</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108713</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Wood Joints</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hölzerne Verbindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Joints En bois</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Junções De madeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giunti Di legno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξύλινες ενώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Empalmes De madera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This simulation shows different wood joints for the construction of a chair and table. It also includes a loading test.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Simulation zeigt unterschiedliche hölzerne 
Verbindungen für den Aufbau eines Stuhls und der Tabelle. Sie 
schließt auch einen Ladentest ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette simulation montre différents joints en bois
pour la construction d'une chaise et d'une table. Elle inclut 
également un essai de chargement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta simulação mostra junções de madeira 
diferentes para a construção de uma cadeira e de uma tabela. 
Inclui também um teste do carregamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa simulazione mostra i giunti di legno 
differenti per la costruzione di una sedia e di una tabella. 
Egualmente include una prova di caricamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η προσομοίωση εμφανίζει διαφορετικές ξύλινες 
ενώσεις για την κατασκευή μιας καρέκλας και ενός πίνακα. 
Περιλαμβάνει επίσης μια δοκιμή φόρτωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta simulación muestra diversos empalmes de 
madera para la construcción de una silla y de un vector. 
También incluye una prueba del cargamento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:FOO LI MING
FN:FOO LI MING
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>

          </contribute>
          <contribute>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
FN:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
